name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Balones y Patadones
name_original: Mortadelo y Filemón: Balones y Patadones
description:
On this occasion, the mission of the agents Mort & Phil will be to locate four bombs that the mafia gang led by Vito Corvino has strategically placed in the football stadium during a national team match.

Local multiplayer option in which each player controls one of the two characters. Use the Zapatófono to communicate with your friends!

A great point & click adventure in which you can control Mort or Filemón according to your preferences: switch between characters and choose who will perform each action.
